nml_record: <nml_option name="config_number_zonal_mean_bins" type="integer" default_value="180" units="unitless" description="Number of bins used for zonal mean. Must be less than or equal to the dimension nZonalMeanBins (set in Registry)." possible_values="Any positive integer value <= nZonalMeanBins." />

dim.name: nZonalMeanBins
dim.description: Maximum number of bins for zonal mean.

dim.name: nZonalMeanBinsP1
dim.description: Maximum number of bins for zonal mean, plus one.

package.name: amZonalMean
package.description: This package includes variables required for the amZonalMean analysis member.

var.name: binCenterZonalMean
var.description: Central coordinate of zonal mean bin, either in latitude or y, for plotting.

var.name: binBoundaryZonalMean
var.description: Coordinate of lower edge of zonal mean bin, either in latitude or y, for plotting.

var.name: zonalVelocityZonalMean
var.description: Zonal mean of component of horizontal velocity in the eastward direction

var.name: meridionalVelocityZonalMean
var.description: Zonal mean of component of horizontal velocity in the northward direction
